title: Building Responsive Layouts with Tailwind CSS
content:
Tailwind CSS is a utility-first CSS framework that makes it easy to build modern, responsive designs. In this tutorial, we'll cover the basics and show you how to create beautiful layouts.

## Why Tailwind CSS?

Tailwind CSS provides low-level utility classes that let you build custom designs without writing custom CSS. This approach offers several advantages:

- Faster development
- Consistent design system
- Easy to maintain
- Highly customizable

## Getting Started

First, install Tailwind CSS in your project:

```bash
npm install -D tailwindcss
npx tailwindcss init
```

Then configure your tailwind.config.js file and add the Tailwind directives to your CSS file.
